ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: 'Htmlwidget' of 'Tippyjs' to add tooltips to 'Shiny' apps and 'R markdown' documents.
'Htmlwidget' of 'Tippyjs' to add tooltips to 'Shiny' apps and 'R markdown' documents.

name: r-tippy
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-tippy
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/tippy_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/tippy/tippy_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 96c9477de8092e9d43b92fa2d284b943e3b631448a8d7e79e9809eae0ed88901

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-htmltools
    - r-htmlwidgets
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-shiny
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-htmltools
    - r-htmlwidgets
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-shiny

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('tippy')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('tippy')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://tippy.john-coene.com/
  license: MIT
  summary: '''Htmlwidget'' of ''Tippyjs'' to add tooltips to ''Shiny'' apps and ''R markdown''
    documents.'
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: tippy
# Title: Add Tooltips to 'R markdown' Documents or 'Shiny' Apps
# Version: 0.1.0
# Authors@R: person("John", "Coene", email = "jcoenep@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre"))
# Description: 'Htmlwidget' of 'Tippyjs' to add tooltips to 'Shiny' apps and 'R markdown' documents.
# Depends: R (>= 3.4.0)
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# Imports: htmlwidgets, htmltools, shiny, jsonlite
# RoxygenNote: 7.1.1
# URL: https://tippy.john-coene.com/
# BugReports: https://github.com/JohnCoene/tippy/issues
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2021-01-11 20:42:47 UTC; jp
# Author: John Coene [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: John Coene <jcoenep@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2021-01-11 21:10:02 UTC
